test_scenarios.name: Backend ↔ PKCS#11 Integration
test_scenarios.details: PKCS#11 provider successfully communicates with backend for crypto operations

test_scenarios.name: Backend ↔ CTK Integration
test_scenarios.details: Basic CTK to backend communication working, advanced operations incomplete

test_scenarios.name: Cross-Provider Key Compatibility
test_scenarios.details: Keys generated via backend can be used by PKCS#11 provider

test_scenarios.name: Multi-Platform Workflow
test_scenarios.details: Linux PKCS#11 ↔ Backend ↔ macOS CTK workflow partially functional

test_scenarios.name: Error Propagation Testing
test_scenarios.details: Backend errors properly propagated to providers

test_scenarios.name: Performance Under Load
test_scenarios.details: System handles concurrent operations from multiple providers
